DataElement.preferredName: Dose Reduced And/Or Withdraw Day Occurrence Timepoint Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of when the dose was reduced and/or withdrawn.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dose Reduced And/Or Withdraw Day Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An indication that a medication schedule was modified by subtraction, either by changing the frequency, strength or amount._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._To cease active participation in; remove from active use._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An indication that a medication schedule was modified by subtraction, either by changing the frequency, strength or amount.:Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.:To cease active participation in; remove from active use.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

Concepts.definition: An indication that a medication schedule was modified by subtraction, either by changing the frequency, strength or amount.
Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.
To cease active participation in; remove from active use.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.: A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.
